choice.minecraft.double_mob_drops.descri: Mobs drop twice as many items.
choice.minecraft.no_fire_damage.descript: You take no damage from fire or lava.
choice.minecraft.instant_bonemeal.descri: Any bonemealable block you place gets instantly bonemealed
choice.minecraft.instant_breeding.descri: Animals around you get their breed cooldown reset
choice.minecraft.reduced_fall_damage.des: Take less damage from falling. Equivalent to feather falling III
choice.minecraft.faster_furnaces.descrip: Furnaces around you smelt items faster.
choice.minecraft.infinite_shearing.descr: Sheep never lose their wool when you shear them.
choice.minecraft.max_durability.descript: Tools and armor get their durability set to the max.
choice.minecraft.stepheight.description: Increase your step height to a little over 1 full block.
choice.minecraft.slowfalling.description: Receive slow falling when falling over 3 blocks.
choice.minecraft.ice_physics.description: Every block acts like ice. Yes this also works with boats. Have fun :)
choice.minecraft.infinite_pearls.descrip: Everytime your pearl lands you get it back. Infinite pearls.
choice.minecraft.jesus.description: Walk on water. Sneak to go below water. Be careful with moving side to side if you are going up.
choice.minecraft.infinite_water_bucket.d: Water buckets doesn't drain unless sneaking
choice.minecraft.receive_elytra.descript: Receive an elytra with 30 durability, cannot be enchanted and gets cleared upon breaking.
choice.minecraft.always_phantom.descript: Phantoms always spawn, regardless of if you slept or not.
choice.minecraft.aggressive_enderman.des: Endermen nearby instantly get aggressive at you.
choice.minecraft.occasional_drops.descri: Occasionally you drop whatever is in your main hand.
choice.minecraft.random_sprint.descripti: Occasionally you randomly start or stop sprinting.
choice.minecraft.thick_fog.description: Render distance is reduced to 3 chunks.
choice.minecraft.lowerjump.description: You can only jump as high as a slab.
choice.minecraft.noarmorabovediamond.des: Cannot wear armor above diamond tier.
choice.minecraft.hotbarfov.description: FOV is based on what slot you have selected in your hotbar.
choice.minecraft.explode.description: You explode. Once. You do not die.
choice.minecraft.blindness.description: You are receive the blindness effect.
choice.minecraft.hunger.description: You constantly have the hunger effect
choice.minecraft.slowness.description: You constantly have the slowness effect.
